inlinePayload.name: get_my_appointments__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get user's appointments for a specific date or today. Returns list of scheduled meetings with time, title, duration, location and attendees.

date.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not provided, returns today's appointments.

inlinePayload.name: check_email_inbox__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Check recent emails in specified folder. Returns email sender, subject, received time, read status and preview.

folder.description: Email folder to check (e.g., 'inbox', 'sent', 'drafts'). Default is 'inbox'.

limit.description: Maximum number of emails to return. Default is 5.

inlinePayload.name: get_team_members__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get list of team members with their roles and availability status. Can be filtered by department.

department.description: Filter by department (e.g., 'Engineering', 'Product', 'Design'). If not provided, returns all team members.

inlinePayload.name: check_pto_balance__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Check current PTO (Paid Time Off) balance including vacation days, sick days, personal days, and next scheduled time off.

inlinePayload.name: get_recent_expenses__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get recent expense reports with category, amount, description and approval status. Useful for tracking spending and pending reimbursements.

days.description: Number of days to look back for expenses. Default is 30.

inlinePayload.name: search_internal_documents__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Search internal company documents and knowledge base including policies, technical guides, and presentations.

query.description: Search query to find relevant documents.

inlinePayload.name: get_project_status__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get status of active projects or a specific project including completion percentage, due date, team size, blockers and recent updates.

project_name.description: Name of specific project to get status for. If not provided, returns all active projects.

inlinePayload.name: create_task__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Create a new task in the task management system with title, description, priority level and optional due date.

description.description: Detailed description of the task. Optional.

due_date.description: Due date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Optional.

inlinePayload.name: get_system_notifications__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Get system notifications and alerts including security warnings, system updates and important messages.

unread_only.description: If true, only return unread notifications. Default is true.

inlinePayload.name: book_meeting_room__controlled
inlinePayload.description: Book a meeting room for a specified date and time. Returns booking confirmation or suggests alternatives if unavailable.

room_name.description: Name of the meeting room to book.

date.description: Date for the booking in YYYY-MM-DD format.

duration_minutes.description: Duration of the meeting in minutes. Default is 60.

inlinePayload.name: search_web__public
inlinePayload.description: Search the web for information and return relevant results with titles, URLs, snippets and sources.

query.description: Search query to look up on the web.

num_results.description: Number of search results to return. Default is 5.

inlinePayload.name: get_weather__public
inlinePayload.description: Get current weather conditions and forecast for any location including temperature, conditions, humidity and wind speed.

location.description: City name or location to get weather for (e.g., 'San Francisco', 'New York, NY').

inlinePayload.name: get_stock_price__public
inlinePayload.description: Get current stock price and market information including price changes, volume, market cap, and day high/low.

inlinePayload.name: translate_text__public
inlinePayload.description: Translate text from one language to another. Supports automatic source language detection.

source_language.description: Source language of the text. Use 'auto' for automatic detection. Default is 'auto'.

inlinePayload.name: get_news_headlines__public
inlinePayload.description: Get latest news headlines and articles for a specific topic or country with summaries and sources.

topic.description: News topic or category (e.g., 'technology', 'business', 'sports'). Default is 'general'.

country.description: Country code for regional news (e.g., 'us', 'uk', 'ca'). Default is 'us'.

inlinePayload.name: send_email_external__public
inlinePayload.description: Send an email to an external recipient with specified subject and body content.

inlinePayload.name: calculate_distance__public
inlinePayload.description: Calculate distance and travel time between two locations with different transportation modes.

inlinePayload.name: get_restaurant_recommendations__public
inlinePayload.description: Get restaurant recommendations for a location with ratings, cuisine types, price ranges and popular dishes.

location.description: City or area to search for restaurants.

price_range.description: Price range indicator: '\$', '\$\$', '\$\$\$', or '\$\$\$\$'. Default is '\$\$'.

inlinePayload.name: get_movie_info__public
inlinePayload.description: Get comprehensive information about a movie including year, rating, genres, director, cast, runtime and streaming availability.

title.description: Title of the movie to look up.

inlinePayload.name: check_flight_status__public
inlinePayload.description: Check real-time flight status including departure/arrival times, gates, delays and airline information.
